title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Does Not Include File Type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Does Not Include File Type. Additionally, the icon has changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing Java file.
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click on the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon.
   - A dialog box will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename, without including the file extension (not requested).
6) Click Ok.
   - Observe that the file has been added to the specified location in the Navigator, but without a file extension shown.
EB: When saving a file using the SaveAs feature, the saved file should include the appropriate file type extension.
SR:
1) Open the software.
2) Open an existing Java file.
3) Make modifications to the file.
4) Click on the 'SaveAs' icon, located next to the 'Save' icon.
5) In the dialog box that appears, browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the desired filename without including the file extension.
7) Click 'Ok'.
8) Verify that the file has been successfully saved in the specified location and with the correct file type extension displayed in the Navigator.
